New Records: Angola set a new record by securing two wins, their highest ever at the Africa Cup of Nations
Key Match Events: Namibia secured their first-ever win at the Africa Cup of Nations in their opener
Pre-Game Insights: Angola's focus on goal-scoring prowess and Namibia's strategic approach under coach Collin Benjamin
Post-Match Reflections: Significance of the match for both teams' progression in the tournament
Miscellaneous Highlights: Match venue: Stade de Bouake, match time: 5pm UK
Team lineups provided for both Angola and Namibia
